articles.title: Super League threatens to widen the gap in the already lopsided European football scene - ABC News
articles.description: A football league where the giants are self-appointed and most of the games don't matter runs completely counter to the ethos of football — that every minnow can have a miracle run and any monolith can tumble.

articles.description: The new Super League is about putting more power and money in the hands of the most elite, says Sky's sports correspondent.
